Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Houston in 2016...
Traded from Houston to Colorado on 2/17/2016 (Going to HOU: CF Draft Compensation. Going to COL: LF Gordon Grubb)...
Injured on 8/28/2016 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 4/22/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/5/2017, off Cleo Maldonado (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/25/2017, off Oscar Santiago (CIN)...
Injured on 7/22/2018 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2018, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 9/26/2018 with a Broken Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .313 with 10 HR, 21 RBI...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,285,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/28/2021 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2021, hitting .360 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,964,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,964,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Colorado to Cincinnati on 6/10/2023 (Going to CIN: CF John Yahei, LF Gordon Grubb. Going to COL: SS Bradly Doty, P Celso Resto, 1B Mark Lavergne, CF Stephen Washington)...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/17/2023 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
10/1/2023: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/26/2024 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 7/25/2025 (Going to MON: LF Gordon Grubb, P Jack Cypert, P James Albers. Going to CIN: RF Thomas Finley, P Brett Arceo)...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2025...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/2/2026 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Colorado on 5/24/2026...
Released by Montreal on 10/17/2026...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/4/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against New York on 5/3/2027...
Was selected to the 2027 Allstar game...
